bibl.title: Letter from Jefferson Randolph Kean to Mrs. Mason Young, May 25, 1899

div1.p: Jefferson Randolph Kean discusses family news and life in Cuba.

div1.head: Letter from Jefferson Randolph Kean to Mrs. Mason Young, May 25, 1899
div1.opener:
Chief Surgeon's Office.
HEADQUARTERS SEVENTH ARMY CORPS. Dept. Havana & Pinar del Rio
Quemados, Cuba
May 25 - 99
Mrs. Mason Young-
My dear Mummy
div1.p:
It makes the hearts
of all of us (including
Caz.) go pit-i-pat to think
of your coming so near us
as st Augustine - I suppose
your friends would think
that you had quite lost
your senses if you ran
over to see us, but I see
no reason why you should
not do so - and many
why you should- There
is no yellow fever in Havana
now, at least Dr Ludlow and
Dr Black and the other
Engineer Doctors say so,
and they must know, as
they know everything-

It is no hotter here than
it is in Virginia at this
season, and we all want
to see our Mummy very
much. I do not think it
will be much more expen-
sive to go back to New York
this way than from St. Augus-
tine by rail - that is unless
you have passes by rail.

We are all well & happy-
Martha has prickly heat
& is not pretty, but seems
not to care for that as
long as she has her own
way about everything else.

I have taken up the habit
of early rising and get up at 6-
so this is my second letter & your girls
are just getting up. Martha has the
most remarkable position for sleeping,
on her knees with her face & chest in
the pillow, & her little back usually
bare sticking up- How she keeps her
balance in her sleep I do not under-
stand- We find the Sturgis's pleasant
mess-mates- She is an only daughter
& somewhat of an enfant gate's, but
is very sweet & nice- Gen. Lee who is
as fond of Louise as ever has built a bath
house at Playa, and they - Mrs. S. & L
go down in the afternoon & have a
nice swim almost daily - It is very
good for them as they have been taking
very little exercise-

Goodbye dear mummy - come & see
us if you can - you being of course plural
& including the Bunny Sister who I
am sure wants to see ---- me.
div1.closer: Yours affectionately Randolph Louise says send her two bathing caps-
